# numberFormatter

**Instance Property**

The number formatter used to format the quantity of a measurement.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var numberFormatter: NumberFormatter! { get set }
```

## Discussion

If unspecified, an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter] object with [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NumberFormatter/Style/decimal] style is used.

## Specifying the Format

- **unitOptions**: The options for how the unit is formatted.
- **MeasurementFormatter.UnitOptions**: Measurement formatter options.
- **unitStyle**: The unit style.
- **locale**: The locale of the formatter.
